And<S>1161</S> it came to pass<S>1096</S>, that, while Apollos<S>625</S> was<S>1511</S> <S>1722</S> at<S>1722</S> Corinth<S>2882</S>, Paul<S>3972</S> having passed<S>1330</S> through the upper<S>510</S> coasts<S>3313</S> came<S>2064</S> to<S>1519</S> Ephesus<S>2181</S>: and<S>2532</S> finding<S>2147</S> certain<S>5100</S> disciples<S>3101</S>,
He said<S>2036</S> unto<S>4314</S> them<S>846</S>,<S>1487</S> Have ye received<S>2983</S> the Holy<S>40</S> Ghost<S>4151</S> since ye believed<S>4100</S>? And<S>1161</S> they said<S>2036</S> unto<S>4314</S> him<S>846</S>,<S>235</S> We have<S>191</S> not so much as<S>3761</S> heard<S>191</S> whether<S>1487</S> there be any<S>2076</S> Holy<S>40</S> Ghost<S>4151</S>.
And<S>5037</S> he said<S>2036</S> unto<S>4314</S> them<S>846</S>, Unto<S>1519</S> what<S>5101</S> then<S>3767</S> were ye baptized<S>907</S>? And<S>1161</S> they said<S>2036</S>, Unto<S>1519</S> John's<S>2491</S> baptism<S>908</S>.
Then<S>1161</S> said<S>2036</S> Paul<S>3972</S>, John<S>2491</S> verily<S>3303</S> baptized<S>907</S> with the baptism<S>908</S> of repentance<S>3341</S>, saying<S>3004</S> unto the people<S>2992</S>, that<S>2443</S> they should believe<S>4100</S> on<S>1519</S> him which should come<S>2064</S> after<S>3326</S> him<S>846</S>, that is<S>5123</S>, on<S>1519</S> Christ<S>5547</S> Jesus<S>2424</S>.
When<S>1161</S> they heard<S>191</S> this, they were baptized<S>907</S> in<S>1519</S> the name<S>3686</S> of the Lord<S>2962</S> Jesus<S>2424</S>.
And<S>2532</S> when Paul<S>3972</S> had laid<S>2007</S> his hands<S>5495</S> upon<S>2007</S> them<S>846</S>, the Holy<S>40</S> Ghost<S>4151</S> came<S>2064</S> on<S>1909</S> them<S>846</S>; and<S>5037</S> they spake<S>2980</S> with tongues<S>1100</S>, and<S>2532</S> prophesied<S>4395</S>.
And<S>1161</S> all<S>3956</S> the men<S>435</S> were<S>2258</S> about<S>5616</S> twelve<S>1177</S>.
And<S>1161</S> he went<S>1525</S> into<S>1519</S> the synagogue<S>4864</S>, and spake boldly<S>3955</S> for the space<S>1909</S> of three<S>5140</S> months<S>3376</S>, disputing<S>1256</S> and<S>2532</S> persuading<S>3982</S> the things concerning<S>4012</S> the kingdom<S>932</S> of God<S>2316</S>.
But<S>1161</S> when<S>5613</S> divers<S>5100</S> were hardened<S>4645</S>, and<S>2532</S> believed not<S>544</S>, but spake evil<S>2551</S> of that way<S>3598</S> before<S>1799</S> the multitude<S>4128</S>, he departed<S>868</S> from<S>575</S> them<S>846</S>, and separated<S>873</S> the disciples<S>3101</S>, disputing<S>1256</S> daily<S>2596</S> <S>2250</S> in<S>1722</S> the school<S>4981</S> of one<S>5100</S> Tyrannus<S>5181</S>.
And<S>1161</S> this<S>5124</S> continued<S>1096</S> by the space<S>1909</S> of two<S>1417</S> years<S>2094</S>; so<S>5620</S> that all<S>3956</S> they which dwelt in<S>2730</S> Asia<S>773</S> heard<S>191</S> the word<S>3056</S> of the Lord<S>2962</S> Jesus<S>2424</S>, both<S>5037</S> Jews<S>2453</S> and<S>2532</S> Greeks<S>1672</S>.
And<S>5037</S> God<S>2316</S> wrought<S>4160</S> special<S>3756</S> <S>5177</S> miracles<S>1411</S> by<S>1223</S> the hands<S>5495</S> of Paul<S>3972</S>:
So<S>2532</S> <S>5620</S> that from<S>575</S> his<S>846</S> body<S>5559</S> were brought<S>2018</S> unto<S>1909</S> the sick<S>770</S> handkerchiefs<S>4676</S> or<S>2228</S> aprons<S>4612</S>, and<S>2532</S> the diseases<S>3554</S> departed<S>525</S> from<S>575</S> them<S>846</S>, and<S>5037</S> the evil<S>4190</S> spirits<S>4151</S> went<S>1831</S> out of<S>575</S> them<S>846</S>.
Then<S>1161</S> certain<S>5100</S> of<S>575</S> the vagabond<S>4022</S> Jews<S>2453</S>, exorcists<S>1845</S>, took upon them<S>2021</S> to call<S>3687</S> over<S>1909</S> them which had<S>2192</S> evil<S>4190</S> spirits<S>4151</S> the name<S>3686</S> of the Lord<S>2962</S> Jesus<S>2424</S>, saying<S>3004</S>, We adjure<S>3726</S> you<S>5209</S> by Jesus<S>2424</S> whom<S>3739</S> Paul<S>3972</S> preacheth<S>2784</S>.
And<S>1161</S> there were<S>2258</S> seven<S>2033</S> sons<S>5207</S> of one Sceva<S>4630</S> <S>5100</S>, a Jew<S>2453</S>, and chief of the priests<S>749</S>, which did<S>4160</S> so<S>5124</S>.
And<S>1161</S> the evil<S>4190</S> spirit<S>4151</S> answered<S>611</S> and said<S>2036</S>, Jesus<S>2424</S> I know<S>1097</S>, and<S>2532</S> Paul<S>3972</S> I know<S>1987</S>; but<S>1161</S> who<S>5101</S> are<S>2075</S> ye<S>5210</S>?
And<S>2532</S> the man<S>444</S> in<S>1722</S> whom<S>3739</S> the evil<S>4190</S> spirit<S>4151</S> was<S>2258</S> leaped<S>2177</S> on<S>1909</S> them<S>846</S>, and<S>2532</S> overcame<S>2634</S> them<S>846</S>, and prevailed<S>2480</S> against<S>2596</S> them<S>846</S>, so<S>5620</S> that they fled<S>1628</S> out of<S>1537</S> that<S>1565</S> house<S>3624</S> naked<S>1131</S> and<S>2532</S> wounded<S>5135</S>.
And<S>1161</S> this<S>5124</S> was<S>1096</S> known<S>1110</S> to all<S>3956</S> the Jews<S>2453</S> and<S>5037</S> Greeks<S>1672</S> also<S>2532</S> dwelling<S>2730</S> at Ephesus<S>2181</S>; and<S>2532</S> fear<S>5401</S> fell<S>1968</S> on<S>1909</S> them<S>846</S> all<S>3956</S>, and<S>2532</S> the name<S>3686</S> of the Lord<S>2962</S> Jesus<S>2424</S> was magnified<S>3170</S>.
And<S>5037</S> many<S>4183</S> that believed<S>4100</S> came<S>2064</S>, and confessed<S>1843</S>, and<S>2532</S> shewed<S>312</S> their<S>846</S> deeds<S>4234</S>.
Many<S>2425</S> of them also<S>1161</S> which used<S>4238</S> curious arts<S>4021</S> brought<S>4851</S> their books<S>976</S> together<S>4851</S>, and burned them<S>2618</S> before<S>1799</S> all<S>3956</S> men: and<S>2532</S> they counted<S>4860</S> the price<S>5092</S> of them<S>846</S>, and<S>2532</S> found<S>2147</S> it fifty<S>4002</S> thousand<S>3461</S> pieces of silver<S>694</S>.
So<S>3779</S> mightily<S>2596</S> <S>2904</S> grew<S>837</S> the word<S>3056</S> of God<S>2962</S> and<S>2532</S> prevailed<S>2480</S>.
After<S>1161</S> <S>5613</S> these things<S>5023</S> were ended<S>4137</S>, Paul<S>3972</S> purposed<S>5087</S> in<S>1722</S> the spirit<S>4151</S>, when he had passed through<S>1330</S> Macedonia<S>3109</S> and<S>2532</S> Achaia<S>882</S>, to go<S>4198</S> to<S>1519</S> Jerusalem<S>2419</S>, saying<S>2036</S>, After<S>3754</S> <S>3326</S> I<S>3165</S> have been<S>1096</S> there<S>1563</S>, I<S>3165</S> must<S>1163</S> also<S>2532</S> see<S>1492</S> Rome<S>4516</S>.
So<S>1161</S> he sent<S>649</S> into<S>1519</S> Macedonia<S>3109</S> two<S>1417</S> of them that ministered<S>1247</S> unto him<S>846</S>, Timotheus<S>5095</S> and<S>2532</S> Erastus<S>2037</S>; but he himself<S>846</S> stayed<S>1907</S> in<S>1519</S> Asia<S>773</S> for a season<S>5550</S>.
And<S>1161</S> <S>2596</S> the same<S>1565</S> time<S>2540</S> there arose<S>1096</S> no<S>3756</S> small<S>3641</S> stir<S>5017</S> about<S>4012</S> that way<S>3598</S>.
For<S>1063</S> a certain<S>5100</S> man named<S>3686</S> Demetrius<S>1216</S>, a silversmith<S>695</S>, which made<S>4160</S> silver<S>693</S> shrines<S>3485</S> for Diana<S>735</S>, brought<S>3930</S> no<S>3756</S> small<S>3641</S> gain<S>2039</S> unto the craftsmen<S>5079</S>;
Whom<S>3739</S> he called together<S>4867</S> with the workmen<S>2040</S> of<S>4012</S> like occupation<S>5108</S>, and<S>2532</S> said<S>2036</S>, Sirs<S>435</S>, ye know<S>1987</S> that<S>3754</S> by<S>1537</S> this<S>5026</S> craft<S>2039</S> we have<S>2076</S> our<S>2257</S> wealth<S>2142</S>.
Moreover<S>2532</S> ye see<S>2334</S> and<S>2532</S> hear<S>191</S>, that<S>3754</S> not<S>3756</S> alone<S>3440</S> at Ephesus<S>2181</S>, but<S>235</S> almost<S>4975</S> throughout all<S>3956</S> Asia<S>773</S>, this<S>3778</S> Paul<S>3972</S> hath persuaded<S>3982</S> and turned away<S>3179</S> much<S>2425</S> people<S>3793</S>, saying<S>3004</S> that<S>3754</S> they be<S>1526</S> no<S>3756</S> gods<S>2316</S>, which<S>3588</S> are made<S>1096</S> with<S>1223</S> hands<S>5495</S>:
So<S>1161</S> that not<S>3756</S> only<S>3440</S> this<S>5124</S> our<S>2254</S> craft<S>3313</S> is in danger<S>2793</S> to be set<S>2064</S> at<S>1519</S> nought<S>557</S>; but<S>235</S> also<S>2532</S> that the temple<S>2411</S> of the great<S>3173</S> goddess<S>2299</S> Diana<S>735</S> should be despised<S>1519</S> <S>3762</S> <S>3049</S>, and<S>1161</S> <S>2532</S> her<S>846</S> magnificence<S>3168</S> should<S>3195</S> be destroyed<S>2507</S>, whom<S>3739</S> all<S>3650</S> Asia<S>773</S> and<S>2532</S> the world<S>3625</S> worshippeth<S>4576</S>. <sup>set at nought: or, brought into disrepute, or, contempt</sup>
And<S>1161</S> when they heard<S>191</S> these sayings, they were<S>1096</S> full<S>4134</S> of wrath<S>2372</S>, and<S>2532</S> cried out<S>2896</S>, saying<S>3004</S>, Great<S>3173</S> is Diana<S>735</S> of the Ephesians<S>2180</S>.
And<S>2532</S> the whole<S>3650</S> city<S>4172</S> was filled<S>4130</S> with confusion<S>4799</S>: and<S>5037</S> having caught<S>4884</S> Gaius<S>1050</S> and<S>2532</S> Aristarchus<S>708</S>, men of Macedonia<S>3110</S>, Paul's<S>3972</S> companions in travel<S>4898</S>, they rushed<S>3729</S> with one accord<S>3661</S> into<S>1519</S> the theatre<S>2302</S>.
And<S>1161</S> when<S>1014</S> Paul<S>3972</S> would<S>1014</S> have entered<S>1525</S> in<S>1519</S> unto the people<S>1218</S>, the disciples<S>3101</S> suffered<S>1439</S> him<S>846</S> not<S>3756</S>.
And<S>1161</S> <S>2532</S> certain<S>5100</S> of the chief of Asia<S>775</S>, which were<S>5607</S> his<S>846</S> friends<S>5384</S>, sent<S>3992</S> unto<S>4314</S> him<S>846</S>, desiring<S>3870</S> him that he would<S>1325</S> not<S>3361</S> adventure<S>1325</S> himself<S>1438</S> into<S>1519</S> the theatre<S>2302</S>.
Some<S>243</S> therefore<S>3767</S> <S>3303</S> cried<S>2896</S> one thing<S>5100</S>, and some another<S>243</S>: for<S>1063</S> the assembly<S>1577</S> was<S>2258</S> confused<S>4797</S>; and<S>2532</S> the more part<S>4119</S> knew<S>1492</S> not<S>3756</S> wherefore<S>5101</S> <S>1752</S> they were come together<S>4905</S>.
And<S>1161</S> they drew<S>4264</S> Alexander<S>223</S> out of<S>1537</S> the multitude<S>3793</S>, the Jews<S>2453</S> putting<S>4261</S> him<S>846</S> forward<S>4261</S> <S>4261</S>. And<S>1161</S> Alexander<S>223</S> beckoned<S>2678</S> with the hand<S>5495</S>, and would<S>2309</S> have made his defence<S>626</S> unto the people<S>1218</S>.
But<S>1161</S> when they knew<S>1921</S> that<S>3754</S> he was<S>2076</S> a Jew<S>2453</S>, all<S>3956</S> <S>1096</S> with<S>1537</S> one<S>3391</S> voice<S>5456</S> about<S>5613</S> the space<S>1909</S> of two<S>1417</S> hours<S>5610</S> cried out<S>2896</S>, Great<S>3173</S> is Diana<S>735</S> of the Ephesians<S>2180</S>.
And<S>1161</S> when the townclerk<S>1122</S> had appeased<S>2687</S> the people<S>3793</S>, he said<S>5346</S>, Ye men<S>435</S> of Ephesus<S>2180</S>, what<S>5101</S> <S>1063</S> man<S>444</S> is there<S>2076</S> that<S>3739</S> knoweth<S>1097</S> not<S>3756</S> how that the city<S>4172</S> of the Ephesians<S>2180</S> is<S>5607</S> a worshipper<S>3511</S> of the great<S>3173</S> goddess<S>2299</S> Diana<S>735</S>, and<S>2532</S> of the image which fell down from Jupiter<S>1356</S>? <sup>a worshipper: Gr. the temple keeper</sup>
Seeing<S>5607</S> then<S>3767</S> that these things<S>5130</S> cannot be spoken against<S>368</S>, ye<S>5209</S> ought<S>1163</S> <S>2076</S> to be<S>5225</S> quiet<S>2687</S>, and<S>2532</S> to do<S>4238</S> nothing<S>3367</S> rashly<S>4312</S>.
For<S>1063</S> ye have brought hither<S>71</S> these<S>5128</S> men<S>435</S>, which are neither<S>3777</S> robbers of churches<S>2417</S>, nor yet<S>3777</S> blasphemers<S>987</S> of your<S>5216</S> goddess<S>2299</S>.
Wherefore<S>3303</S> <S>3767</S> if<S>1487</S> Demetrius<S>1216</S>, and<S>2532</S> the craftsmen<S>5079</S> which are with<S>4862</S> him<S>846</S>, have<S>2192</S> a matter<S>3056</S> against<S>4314</S> any man<S>5100</S>, the law<S>60</S> is open<S>71</S>, and<S>2532</S> there are<S>1526</S> deputies<S>446</S>: let them implead<S>1458</S> one another<S>240</S>. <sup>the law: or, the court days are kept</sup>
But<S>1161</S> if<S>1487</S> ye enquire<S>1934</S> any thing<S>5100</S> concerning<S>4012</S> other matters<S>2087</S>, it shall be determined<S>1956</S> in<S>1722</S> a lawful<S>1772</S> assembly<S>1577</S>. <sup>lawful: or, ordinary</sup>
For<S>1063</S> <S>2532</S> we are in danger<S>2793</S> to be called in question<S>1458</S> for<S>4012</S> this day's<S>4594</S> uproar<S>4714</S>, there being<S>5225</S> no<S>3367</S> cause<S>158</S> whereby<S>4012</S> <S>3739</S> we may<S>1410</S> give<S>591</S> an account<S>3056</S> of this<S>5026</S> concourse<S>4963</S>.
And<S>2532</S> when he had<S>2036</S> thus<S>5023</S> spoken<S>2036</S>, he dismissed<S>630</S> the assembly<S>1577</S>.
